TITLE: Roulette
USAGE:
Usage:
`{{prefix}}roulette <amount|all> <bet>`

Bets: red/black, even/odd, high/low, dozen1/2/3, or number 0-36.

Examples: `{{prefix}}roulette 100 red` â€¢ `{{prefix}}roulette all 17`
BET_INVALID: Bet not recognized. Use: red/black, even/odd, high/low, dozen1/2/3 or a number 0-36.
AMOUNT_INVALID: Amount must be greater than 0 (or use `all`).
NO_FUNDS: You don't have coins to bet. Earn some and try again.
INSUFFICIENT: You tried to bet **{{amount}}** ðŸª™ but you have **{{balance}}** ðŸª™.
MONGO_MISSING: MongoDB isn't configured, the economy system is unavailable.
ECONOMY_UNAVAILABLE: I couldn't access your economy right now. Please try again.
CAP_NOTE: *(Cap: 25% of your balance, max 5,000 per play. Only the capped amount is at risk.)*
